mapper.select: SELECT id,nick_name AS nickName,avatar_url AS avatarUrl,DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i') AS createTime FROM wx_player WHERE (lotto_no = #{idOrNo} or lotto_id = #{idOrNo}) AND status = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT l.id,l.lotto_no, l.banner, l.open_type AS openType , DATE_FORMAT(p.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i') AS createTime, l.view_num AS viewNum, l.join_num AS joinNum ,u.avatar_url as avatarUrl,l.nick_name as nickName FROM wx_player p LEFT JOIN wx_lotto_info l ON p.lotto_id = l.id
AND p.is_win = 1
LEFT JOIN wx_user u ON u.wx_no = l.create_by WHERE p.wx_no = #{wxNo} AND l.status = 0 ORDER BY p.create_time DESC

SELECT id, prize_img as img ,lotto_no AS lottoNo,prize_name AS name ,status,wx_no as wxNo,nick_name as nickName, is_used as isUsed, avatar_url AS avatarUrl, name,DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i') AS createTime FROM wx_player where wx_no = #{wxNo} AND type = #{type} and is_win = 1 AND status < 2 ORDER BY is_used ASC ,create_time DESC
SELECT count(1) FROM wx_player WHERE wx_no = #{wxNo} AND lotto_id = #{lottoId} AND status = 0

SELECT p.id, u.avatar_url,u.nick_name,p.address,p.tel,p.name, p.prize_img AS img ,p.prize_name AS prizeName,DATE_FORMAT(p.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i') AS createTime FROM wx_player p LEFT JOIN wx_user u ON u.wx_no = p.wx_no WHERE p.is_used=0 AND p.lotto_no = #{lottoNo} AND p.wx_no = #{wxNo} AND p.status < 2
